attributes.action: save the A & E Dept at St. Richards Hospital, Chichester, West Sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is vital that St. Richards Hospital remain fully functioning as it is one of the finest hospitals in Britain. For the whole of West Sussex it would be unthinkable to have to go to Hampshire or Brighton in an emergency. Lives will be lost!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
